org.opends.server.types

Class RecordingOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • org.opends.server.types.RecordingOutputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class RecordingOutputStream
extends java.io.OutputStream
    A wrapper OutputStream that will record all writes to an underlying OutputStream. The recorded bytes will append to any previous recorded bytes until the clear method is called.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RecordingOutputStream(java.io.OutputStream parentStream)
      Constructs a new RecordingOutputStream that will all writes to the given OutputStream.
